title: Sayan Bliss: 1-Bedroom Villa with Private Pool
summary:
Kamajaya Unit 6 is a romantic hideaway designed for couples to enjoy quality time together. Located in the peaceful Banjar Baung, Sayan, Ubud, the villa features a private pool and a cozy dining area, perfect for creating intimate moments.

Surrounded by Bali's natural beauty, this serene retreat combines comfort and romance, making it ideal for a relaxing escape. Allow us to craft unforgettable moments for you with our attentive care and tailored services.

The space
Designed for up to 2 guests, the villa has A spacious bedroom with an ensuite bathroom featuring a freestanding shower, hot water, and a luxurious stone bathtub. Open living and dining areas with seamless access to the private pool, ideal for refreshing dips or lounging under the sun. A fully equipped kitchen and modern amenities, including air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, a TV, and a water dispenser with complimentary drinking water.

Our top features:
-	Free parking
-	Staff cleaning
-	Direct pool access from the living and kitchen areas

Nearby Attractions & Dining:
Located just 5 km from Ubud Center, the villa is close to many popular spots:
-	Cultural Landmarks: Ubud Palace, Monkey Forest, and Ubud Traditional Market
-	Adventure Activities: Rafting and ATV rides
-	Local Favorites: Sayan Point and cozy cafes and coffee shops at the end of the road.

Guest access
As part of the Kamajaya Villas complex, this villa is entirely yours to enjoy. Your privacy is our priority, and we strive to make your stay as comfortable as possible. The villa is easily accessible via a paved road, and you‚Äôll find a spacious parking for your car or motorbike.

Additional Services to Enhance Your Stay (Available with Additional Charges):
-	Start your day with a magical floating breakfast experience in your private pool, perfect for a romantic morning with your partner.
-	Celebrate birthdays or anniversaries with special decorations to make your moments even more memorable.
-	Explore Ubud and its surroundings with ease by renting a motorbike directly from us.
-	Enjoy a seamless arrival with our airport transfer service, available for an additional fee to ensure a hassle-free journey.
-	Unwind with a rejuvenating massage in the privacy of your villa after a day of exploring Ubud.
-	Need additional sleeping arrangements? We can provide extra beds for a nominal fee, ensuring everyone in your group feels at home.
-	Traveling with little ones? We can arrange baby chairs and cots to make your stay as comfortable as possible for your family.
-	Have your dream vacation with a private chef preparing your favorite dishes.

Our friendly staff is always on hand to assist with any requests, ensuring a personalized and delightful experience throughout your stay. Let us help you create cherished memories during your time with us.

Other things to note
Our pool is 1.2 meters deep and does not have a fence. If you're traveling with small children, please exercise caution.

Bali‚Äôs rich biodiversity means you may encounter animals such as geckos, lizards, ants, or mosquitoes during your stay. While we fumigate monthly and clean the villa daily to minimize pests, we cannot eliminate them entirely. Mosquito spray is available in the villa upon request.
We appreciate your understanding that these natural occurrences are part of Bali's charm, and we cannot accommodate refunds or cancellations related to them.

Your safety and comfort are our priority. Whether you‚Äôre here for a romantic getaway or an adventurous holiday, we‚Äôre here to make your stay unforgettable. We look forward to welcoming you and being a part of your Bali journey!
location: Entire villa in Kecamatan Ubud, Indonesia

Services: Housekeeping available from 10:00‚ÄØAM to 12:00‚ÄØAM, every day

reviews.text:
This villa was nestled in a quiet area and was just what I needed as a solo traveller, while also having big open space to have friends over. 
The place was clean and tidy, open, with beautiful garden space. There was a sweet little bird in her nest, so cute! Surrounded by lots of butterflies and dragonflies too. 
The cleaner, Kadek, is so kind, helpful and attentive. 
The only thing that was a little bothersome was that the hot water ran out very quickly so I couldn‚Äôt use the bath or have a long hot shower. Overall though, a fabulous experience, great value for money.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay! Space looked just like the pictures and was so relaxing and peaceful. Hosts were very responsive and kept in contact with us prior to arrival and throughout our entire stay. All the staff were very nice and helpful as well. They were able to help us with a motor bike rental that was delivered to the villa. We would definitely stay again and would recommend to anyone staying in ubud!

If you are looking for a peaceful and clean place to stay in Ubud, look no further. Mr Wayan and his staff are the best. Ms Tari has an eye for details and will keep the villa clean and smelling good. Mr Wayan keeps a watchful eye to ensure your holiday is going as you planned. They both were available to any inquiries or requests. Thank You, for a wonderful week!!

This villa was great as part of our honeymoon stays. The staff were very friendly, helpful and had great response time.
The whole villa is well maintained and clean and private. We felt super relaxed and happy to even cook because they have a clean kitchen.
Cleaning service is also offered daily if needed.
Really recommend it and hope to be back next time.üòä

I had such a fantastic time during my stay! The villa was super spacious, peaceful, and gorgeous. The private pool was just perfect for unwinding. Plus, the location couldn‚Äôt be better‚Äîjust a quick stroll to lovely cafes, restaurants, and some great sightseeing spots. The service was top-notch and super fast. I recommend it!

Wonderful stay outside downtown Ubud. Away from the hustle and bustle of the city, but within 10 min. taxi or less than half an hour walk in the city center. Super sweet people and a very nice house. What else do you want?

We enjoyed our stay the communication was great helped me out with all of my questions. We had a late pick up from the airport and they were able to come and get us despite the time which I really appreciate.
Amazing stay on our honeymoon. 10/10 recommend. Also additional options like a flower bath and decorations available upon arrival which my wife loved. Would definitely stay here again. Great value!

Beautiful villa, clean. A little far from the center, you have to consider 40 min walk to go only. 
Very quiet neighborhood, responsive host.
I recommend it.
Place looks exactly the same as in the picture. Friendly staffs. Scooter is available at the property. 15mins drive to ubud center.
Accommodation worthy of the description in a fairly quiet neighborhood of Ubud. Perfect stay I recommend
wonderful villa! looks better than the pics! very kind and helpful staff as well.
than in the photos, the poolnha is more big. the place is comfortable and nice

The villa is in excellent condition, and the pool was well-maintained. It looked just like the pictures, and the host was very responsive. Cleaning services were available upon request, and although they offered it daily, we chose not to use it. Everything was quite clean, but if I had to be picky, the curtains could use a bit more cleaning.
The location is a bit further away from central Ubud, but that was what we wanted for our stay. We rented a bike through the villa, which made it easy for us to explore without getting stuck in traffic. If you prefer to have more dining options nearby, you might want to stay closer to the center. Overall, we had a great stay and would love to return.

highlights.title: Dive right in
highlights.description: This is one of the few places in the area with a pool.

highlights.title: Exceptional check-in experience
highlights.description: Recent guests gave the check-in process a 5-star rating.

highlights.description: Superhosts are experienced, highly rated Hosts.
